body: I have... several questions.... and I want none of them answered

How to make your own portal to gensokyo

-Get a jar or glass and add 2 teaspoon of salt
-fill the glass with 1/3rd vinegar and 1/3rd lemon juice
-fill the rest of the glass with laundry bleach
-add 5 to 7 pennies or copper coin of your own country
-take a straw and blow into the glass
-after 10 minutes the portal should start forming!!!
Keep blowing until you're dizzy increase.the C02 in your breath to maks the portal larger and stable 1!1!1!
